name: Penalties
text:
Revision Note
  Part heading added by revisor.
     Any person who violates any provision of this chapter or any rule adopted pursuant to this chapter shall be fined not more than $10,000 for each separate offense.  Each day of each violation shall constitute a separate offense.  Any action taken to impose or collect the penalty provided for in this section shall be made through administrative, civil, or criminal actions. [L 1993, c 312, pt of §3; am L 2002, c 176, §7]
